title: Delaware Veteran’s Trust Fund (Emergency Financial Assistance)
summary: Financial assistance for Delaware veterans and families facing verified emergency financial hardship (housing, utilities, health/welfare needs, etc.), based on fund availability.

requirements.notes: Eligibility is verified by Delaware Office of Veterans Services / Commission of Veterans Affairs; assistance depends on fund availability.

eligibilityNotes: Apply through Delaware Office of Veterans Services / Veterans Service Officer. Intended for verified emergency hardship; awards depend on available funds.

title: Disabled Veterans School Property Tax Credit
summary: Tax credit against 100% of non-vocational school district property tax for qualified disabled veterans (primary residence only).

requirements.notes: Applications due by April 30 for upcoming tax year (per Delaware Dept. of Finance program page).

eligibilityNotes: Applies only to non-vocational school district property tax on your primary residence. Submit application per Delaware Dept. of Finance guidance and deadlines.

title: Hunting & Trapping License Exemption (60%+ Service-Connected Disabled Veteran)
summary: License exemption for hunting and trapping for honorably discharged veterans certified by the VA as at least 60% service-connected disabled (Delaware DNREC).
eligibilityNotes: Use DNREC’s disabled veteran exemption application. Requires VA documentation of 60%+ service-connected disability and honorable discharge.

title: Delaware DMV Military & Veteran Specialty Plates
summary: Specialty plates for veterans/service members (e.g., Purple Heart, Disabled Veteran, former POW, etc.) through Delaware DMV.

requirements.notes: Eligibility varies by plate type; documentation required.

eligibilityNotes: Select the plate type you qualify for and follow Delaware DMV application instructions/document requirements.

title: Delaware State Parks Military Pass
summary: Discounted annual Delaware State Parks pass (Delaware Military Pass) available for eligible military/veterans.

requirements.notes: Pricing and eligibility are managed by Delaware State Parks; see current pass information.

eligibilityNotes: Purchase the Delaware Military Pass through Delaware State Parks channels; provides discounted access during the fee season.

title: Delaware Veterans Benefits (State Benefits Portal)
summary: Central page from Delaware Office of Veterans Services listing major state-provided veteran benefits and links (plates, programs, and services).
eligibilityNotes: Use this as the authoritative hub to discover Delaware-specific programs and find the correct application links.
